titleStmt.title: A key to the key of Scripture: or An exposition with notes, vpon the Epistle to the Romanes; the three first chapters begun at Walsall in Staffordshire, continued at Pitmister in Somerset. By William Sclater Batchelar in Diuinitie, and minister of the Word of God at Pitmister in Somerset.
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1575-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for George Norton, and are to be sould at his shop neere Temple-barre,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A". the last leaf is blank.
Running title reads: An exposition vpon the three first chapters of the Romanes.
With a final errata leaf; the last leaf is blank.
A variant (STC 21839) has Richard Bonian's name in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
